description:
A versatile and compact saw for camping, hiking or adventuring. Using an innovative design, the saw folds up neatly into the handle to safely stow it in your pack or camp bin. With no removable parts, it keeps everything together so you won’t lose some essential piece when you’re out in the wilderness.

  • High carbon steel 30.5cm (12in.) blade is effectively sheathed when folded
  • 4-pivot point design gives more clearance than standard folding saws, so you can use the full length of the blade to cut larger diameter wood
  • Rubberized grip provides a sturdy point of contact
  • Bright green accents make it easy to spot in your pack or trunk
  • Open dimensions are 36.8 x 17.8 x 2.6cm
  • Closed dimensions are 35.1 x 4.6 x 2.8cm
  • Accepts most standard 12in. saw blades
name: Gerber FreeScape Camp Saw
